SENT.plain: We report a patient with Noonan syndrome who had repeated transient ischemic attacks
Moyamoya was diagnosed from the image study
In addition, flunarizine therapy seems to be effective in the prevention of recurrent symptoms and signs
The association of Noonan syndrome and Moyamoya has been reported
To the best of our knowledge, this is the second case report of an association of the Noonan syndrome and Moyamoya
